infoView.title: Upload audio, easily get note information!
infoView.description: This is a free music notation tool that helps you better understand music. Users only need to upload audio, wait for 2 minutes, and the website will analyze the audio using basic-pitch and display the results on the web page. Currently, the note data is only stored locally.
infoView.whatIsBasicPitchDescription: Basic-Pitch is a lightweight audio to MIDI tool developed by Spotify, using advanced machine learning algorithms to efficiently and accurately identify note information (pitch, duration) in audio.
infoView.advantage1Description: Upload audio to quickly get note information.
infoView.advantage2Description: Accurately recognize melody, harmony, and other note information.
infoView.useNowDescription: Upload your audio file, start your music creation journey!

helpBar.title: Shortcut Help
helpBar.sponsorSpan: Your sponsorship is the motivation for my updates!

aboutView.title: About Music Note
aboutView.description: AI Music Note Tool - Free Audio Pitch Analysis Tool
aboutView.function1: Pitch Analysis: Accurately detect notes and pitch in audio
aboutView.function2: Audio Separation: AI separates vocals, drums, bass and other tracks
aboutView.function3: Local Processing: Protect privacy, no need to upload to cloud
aboutView.function4: Free to Use: No registration, no payment required
aboutView.instruction1: Music Note is a professional audio analysis tool that uses advanced AI technology to provide users with accurate pitch analysis and audio separation services. All processing is done locally to ensure the privacy and security of your audio files.
aboutView.instruction2: Supports common audio formats such as MP3, WAV, etc. The operation is simple and the results are accurate. Whether it's music learning, creation, or analysis, Music Note can provide you with professional help.
aboutView.contact: If you encounter any problems during use, or have any suggestions and feedback, please feel free to contact us.

separateView.title: AI Local Audio Separation
separateView.subtitle: Realize vocal and accompaniment separation based on local CPU computing
separateView.feature1: No cloud upload required, 100% local processing
separateView.feature2: 7-minute audio takes about 40 minutes to process
separateView.feature3: Please keep the page open during processing, refresh the page to cancel the task
separateView.feature4: Supports MP3/WAV format, recommended duration less than 10 minutes
separateView.separationSubtitle: Click the buttons below to play or download tracks
separateView.modelDownloadDescription: First use requires downloading AI model files (about 97MB), which will be saved in browser cache after download and can be used directly next time.
separateView.processingMessage: Please wait patiently, AI is separating audio tracks
separateView.modelLoadFailedClearCache: Model loading failed, cache cleared, please re-download
separateView.audioSeparationDescription: You can play and download separated tracks below
separateView.workerInitFailedDescription: Please check network connection or refresh the page to retry
separateView.workerReinitFailedDescription: Please refresh the page to retry
separateView.pleaseSelectValidAudio: Please select a valid audio file

waveformPlayer.title: Audio Waveform
waveformPlayer.subtitle: Click the buttons below to play or download tracks
waveformPlayer.downloadCompleteDescription: All track files have started downloading
waveformPlayer.cleanedDescription: Current results have been cleaned, you can upload audio again
